itemProperties.title: waterBucket
itemProperties.effect:
You put out the hellfire with water from the bucket
and the Lord of the Underworld turns into steam.

itemProperties.title: threads
itemProperties.effect: You chose thread to attack? You really need to rethink your plan

itemProperties.title: book
itemProperties.effect: You recite a verse from a book, but the Lord of the Underworld does not get kinder

itemProperties.title: sword
itemProperties.effect: The old sword is melted, the Lord of the Underworld is laughing at your pathetic attempt

itemProperties.title: pizza
itemProperties.effect: Lord of the Underworld is not hungry

itemProperties.title: textbook
itemProperties.effect: Front-end textbook burns in hellfire. For some reason, an unhealthy smile appears on your face
